name: Location and Spatial Development
description: Location of a firm; market formation and areas; agricultural location; urban spatial equilibrium; trade and spatial equilibrium; locational competition; equilibrium for an industry; trade and location.Area of focus: Urban Geography
prerequisites: MGEA01H3/(ECMA01H3) and [(GGRB02H3 and GGRB05H3) or (CITB01H3 and CITB02H3)] or [[MGEB01H3/(ECMB01H3) or MGEB02H3/(ECMB02H3)] and [MGEB05H3/(ECMB05H3) or MGEB06H3/(ECMB06H3)]]
